sentences.sContent: No , because he gave me anesthesia first .
sentences.sContent_eng: No , because he gave me anesthesia first .
sentences.sCn: 别，因为他先替我麻醉了。

sentences.sContent: The doctor thinks local anesthesia will do for the operation.
sentences.sContent_eng: The doctor thinks local anesthesia will do for the operation.
sentences.sCn: 医生认为这次手术用局部麻醉就可以了。

sentences.sContent: While working with cocaine for nerve block anesthesia, he and some of his associates became addicted.
sentences.sContent_eng: While working with cocaine for nerve block anesthesia, he and some of his associates became addicted.
sentences.sCn: 在研究可卡因用于神经阻滞麻醉的过程中，他和部分助手染上了药瘾。

phrases.pCn: 脊髓麻醉；脊髓性感觉缺失

remMethod.val: an(无) + esthe(感觉) + sia → 无感觉 → 麻醉
